website_summaries.verdict: For those who prefer a flashcard approach to study materials, this is a good collection to use. The density of information per card can be distracting, but the end results are impressive for many test-takers.
pros: Innovative study method for  easier memorization of formulas
Students who prefer flashcards love that the information is already structured in this format
Works well as a supplement to larger CAPM study guides and text books
Solid rate of success with actual exam
cons: Flash cards contain information for several different exams, which can be distracting
Not the best system for all students preparing for the exam

customer_reviews.title: Not Current Information and Wordy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cards to assist in studying for the CAPM exam. I quickly realized a two things about these cards. 1. The cards are not current for the PMBOK 6th edition. There are cards containing information that was removed. 2. They are very wordy, is it more like studying small chapters from the book than actually a flash card. While still somewhat useful for quick studying the information being old is concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew DeBratto

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Dive into CAPM Review
customer_reviews.text: This material has helped me dive into the overwhelming amount of information needed for the CAPM test in a systematic way, controlling the chaos if you will. I have yet to take the exam, but am preparing to do so this September, and knowing that this information is important and verified makes me feel confident in my time spent.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Walter

customer_reviews.title: Huge Quantity of Flashcard!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I was not expected this large quantity of flashcards! So ready for this test!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: They focus on giving you the most information for you to pass the CAPM test
customer_reviews.text: They want you to pass the test and give you extra material for you to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Roldan

customer_reviews.title: I passed the CAPM test
customer_reviews.text: My only study material was the latest PMBOK and these flash cards. I took two weeks off work and I started off by reading the PMBOK and then using the flash cards. I would study the cards and put the ones I could not answer into a separate pile. I went back and studied the sections of the PMBOK I had problems with and then reviewed the cards in that pile again. I repeated this process until that pile was practically non-existent. I was able to pass the test the first time. I have never taken the PMP test, so I can't say if this method of study would work for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: GARY WAKSMUNSKI

customer_reviews.title: Flashcards Already Made...Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of flashcards for studying. I have a hard time with tests and I have to study very hard, so these flashcards will help.
